00005 inline void b3ProjectAxis(const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hull,  const b3Float4& pos, const b3Quaternion& orn, const b3Float4& dir, const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& vertices, b3Scalar& min, b3Scalar& max)
00006 {
00007         min = FLT_MAX;
00008         max = -FLT_MAX;
00009         int numVerts = hull.m_numVertices;
00010 
00011         const b3Float4 localDir = b3QuatRotate(orn.inverse(),dir);
00012 
00013         b3Scalar offset = b3Dot3F4(pos,dir);
00014 
00015         for(int i=0;i<numVerts;i++)
00016         {
00017                 //b3Vector3 pt = trans * vertices[m_vertexOffset+i];
00018                 //b3Scalar dp = pt.dot(dir);
00019                 //b3Vector3 vertex = vertices[hull.m_vertexOffset+i];
00020                 b3Scalar dp = b3Dot3F4((b3Float4&)vertices[hull.m_vertexOffset+i],localDir);
00021                 //b3Assert(dp==dpL);
00022                 if(dp < min)    min = dp;
00023                 if(dp > max)    max = dp;
00024         }
00025         if(min>max)
00026         {
00027                 b3Scalar tmp = min;
00028                 min = max;
00029                 max = tmp;
00030         }
00031         min += offset;
00032         max += offset;
00033 }

00036 inline bool b3TestSepAxis(const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
00037         const b3Float4& posA,const b3Quaternion& ornA,
00038         const b3Float4& posB,const b3Quaternion& ornB,
00039         const b3Float4& sep_axis, const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB,b3Scalar& depth)
00040 {
00041         b3Scalar Min0,Max0;
00042         b3Scalar Min1,Max1;
00043         b3ProjectAxis(hullA,posA,ornA,sep_axis,verticesA, Min0, Max0);
00044         b3ProjectAxis(hullB,posB,ornB, sep_axis,verticesB, Min1, Max1);
00045 
00046         if(Max0<Min1 || Max1<Min0)
00047                 return false;
00048 
00049         b3Scalar d0 = Max0 - Min1;
00050         b3Assert(d0>=0.0f);
00051         b3Scalar d1 = Max1 - Min0;
00052         b3Assert(d1>=0.0f);
00053         depth = d0<d1 ? d0:d1;
00054         return true;
00055 }

00058 inline bool b3FindSeparatingAxis(       const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullA, const b3ConvexPolyhedronData& hullB, 
00059         const b3Float4& posA1,
00060         const b3Quaternion& ornA,
00061         const b3Float4& posB1,
00062         const b3Quaternion& ornB,
00063         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesA,
00064         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesA, 
00065         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesA,
00066         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesA,
00067         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& verticesB, 
00068         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Vector3>& uniqueEdgesB, 
00069         const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3GpuFace>& facesB,
00070         const b3AlignedObjectArray<int>& indicesB,
00071 
00072         b3Vector3& sep)
00073 {
00074         B3_PROFILE("findSeparatingAxis");
00075 
00076         b3Float4 posA = posA1;
00077         posA.w = 0.f;
00078         b3Float4 posB = posB1;
00079         posB.w = 0.f;
00080 //#ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00081         b3Float4 c0local = (b3Float4&)hullA.m_localCenter;
00082 
00083         b3Float4 c0 = b3TransformPoint(c0local, posA, ornA);
00084         b3Float4 c1local = (b3Float4&)hullB.m_localCenter;
00085         b3Float4 c1 = b3TransformPoint(c1local,posB,ornB);
00086         const b3Float4 deltaC2 = c0 - c1;
00087 //#endif
00088 
00089         b3Scalar dmin = FLT_MAX;
00090         int curPlaneTests=0;
00091 
00092         int numFacesA = hullA.m_numFaces;
00093         // Test normals from hullA
00094         for(int i=0;i<numFacesA;i++)
00095         {
00096                 const b3Float4& normal = (b3Float4&)facesA[hullA.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane;
00097                 b3Float4 faceANormalWS = b3QuatRotate(ornA,normal);
00098 
00099                 if (b3Dot3F4(deltaC2,faceANormalWS)<0)
00100                         faceANormalWS*=-1.f;
00101 
00102                 curPlaneTests++;
00103 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00104                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00105                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB, DeltaC2, faceANormalWS, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00106                         continue;
00107                 gActualNbTests++;
00108 #endif
00109 
00110                 
00111                 b3Scalar d;
00112                 if(!b3TestSepAxis( hullA, hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,faceANormalWS, verticesA, verticesB,d))
00113                         return false;
00114 
00115                 if(d<dmin)
00116                 {
00117                         dmin = d;
00118                         sep = (b3Vector3&)faceANormalWS;
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 
00122         int numFacesB = hullB.m_numFaces;
00123         // Test normals from hullB
00124         for(int i=0;i<numFacesB;i++)
00125         {
00126                 b3Float4 normal = (b3Float4&)facesB[hullB.m_faceOffset+i].m_plane;
00127                 b3Float4 WorldNormal = b3QuatRotate(ornB, normal);
00128 
00129                 if (b3Dot3F4(deltaC2,WorldNormal)<0)
00130                 {
00131                         WorldNormal*=-1.f;
00132                 }
00133                 curPlaneTests++;
00134 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00135                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00136                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB,DeltaC2, WorldNormal, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00137                         continue;
00138                 gActualNbTests++;
00139 #endif
00140 
00141                 b3Scalar d;
00142                 if(!b3TestSepAxis(hullA, hullB,posA,ornA,posB,ornB,WorldNormal,verticesA,verticesB,d))
00143                         return false;
00144 
00145                 if(d<dmin)
00146                 {
00147                         dmin = d;
00148                         sep = (b3Vector3&)WorldNormal;
00149                 }
00150         }
00151 
00152 //      b3Vector3 edgeAstart,edgeAend,edgeBstart,edgeBend;
00153 
00154         int curEdgeEdge = 0;
00155         // Test edges
00156         for(int e0=0;e0<hullA.m_numUniqueEdges;e0++)
00157         {
00158                 const b3Float4& edge0 = (b3Float4&) uniqueEdgesA[hullA.m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e0];
00159                 b3Float4 edge0World = b3QuatRotate(ornA,(b3Float4&)edge0);
00160 
00161                 for(int e1=0;e1<hullB.m_numUniqueEdges;e1++)
00162                 {
00163                         const b3Vector3 edge1 = uniqueEdgesB[hullB.m_uniqueEdgesOffset+e1];
00164                         b3Float4 edge1World = b3QuatRotate(ornB,(b3Float4&)edge1);
00165 
00166 
00167                         b3Float4 crossje = b3Cross3(edge0World,edge1World);
00168 
00169                         curEdgeEdge++;
00170                         if(!b3IsAlmostZero((b3Vector3&)crossje))
00171                         {
00172                                 crossje = b3FastNormalized3(crossje);
00173                                 if (b3Dot3F4(deltaC2,crossje)<0)
00174                                         crossje*=-1.f;
00175 
00176 
00177 #ifdef TEST_INTERNAL_OBJECTS
00178                                 gExpectedNbTests++;
00179                                 if(gUseInternalObject && !TestInternalObjects(transA,transB,DeltaC2, Cross, hullA, hullB, dmin))
00180                                         continue;
00181                                 gActualNbTests++;
00182 #endif
00183 
00184                                 b3Scalar dist;
00185                                 if(!b3TestSepAxis( hullA, hullB, posA,ornA,posB,ornB,crossje, verticesA,verticesB,dist))
00186                                         return false;
00187 
00188                                 if(dist<dmin)
00189                                 {
00190                                         dmin = dist;
00191                                         sep = (b3Vector3&)crossje;
00192                                 }
00193                         }
00194                 }
00195 
00196         }
00197 
00198         
00199         if((b3Dot3F4(-deltaC2,(b3Float4&)sep))>0.0f)
00200                 sep = -sep;
00201 
00202         return true;
00203 }
